body_html:
@arunmandal53 Hi, thanks for your link, did this guide work on your machine?
BTW, to all people having troubles with CUDA9.1, if you have to use CUDA9.1, consider to use the master branch or r1.5 branch. Some bugs have been fixed on the master branch.

 BTW, to all people having troubles with CUDA9.1, if you have to use CUDA9.1, consider to use the master branch or r1.5 branch. Some bugs have been fixed on the master branch.
